title: ocioc 2 Pack Flush Mount Ceiling Light Black, 12inch Smart LED Ceiling Light with RGB Light, Compatible with Alexa Google Home 24W APP Control WiFi Light Fixture for Bedroom, Kitchen
features: Smart Control: Ocioc ceiling light fixture can be controlled by APP or voice ( Compatible with Alexa/Google Home). Easy to use. Note: please make sure the installation location is under WIFI coverage. Only 2.4GHz WIFI supported. Item Size: 12 x 12 x 1 inch. Our flush mount light is ETL listed.

Brightness & Color Temperature Adjustable: Our light fixtures ceiling mount provides 20W white light and 4W RGB light. The max lumen is up to 2000. You can adjust the brightness(from 10% to 100%) and color temperature(from 3000K to 6500K) according to your favorite via the APP. WARM TIPS: The RGB light and white light can not be lit at the same time.

Easy Installation & Energy Saving: Compatible with most junction boxes, easy to install. The flush mount light fixture saves energy by 90%. 20W equal to 200W incandescent bulbs. Saving your electricity bill. Note: This product only works with regular ON/OFF toggle switches, please don't use dimmer switches.

16 Million RGB Multi-Colors Light: The ceiling lights are characterized with full RGB modes, each colorâ€™s brightness can be adjustable. You can set the color of the light according to your use scene. Suitable for children's room, living room, bedroom, hotel rooms, bar, basement, kitchen, apartment, etc.

Long Lifespan & 2 Years Warranty: The shell is made of fire-resistance plastic, to prevent any potential disasters caused by an electrical short circuit. Good sealing designs protect the lamp bead from dust. Under normal usage of 8 hours per day, the lifespan of the led flush mount ceiling light could endure more than 5 years. We also provide 2 years warranty for our smart light. Contact us if there is any question, we will be here to provide professional assistance.
description: Feature SAVING ENERGY: Made of high-quality LED beads, up to save 85% more electricity than a traditional bulb. EASY INSTALLATION: Just need 2 steps to complete the installation. (1) Install the light base under the ceiling. (2)then screw the light onto the base. ULTRA THIN: Using advanced side-emitting technology, the lamp body is thinner and the light is more uniform and soft, protecting your eyes from strain. SAFE TO USE: High-quality fireproof plastic housing can prevent the risk of electric shock and leakage. NOT COMPATIBLE WITH DIMMER SWITCHES Specifications: Size: 12 x 12 x 1 Inch Shell Color: Black/White Material: Plastic Shape: Round Power: 20W + 4W Color Temperature: 3000K-6500K CRI: 80Ra Lifetime: 30,000 hours Certification: ETL listed Package Contents: 2 x Smart LED Ceiling Light 1 Pack Mounting Accessories
